trans-unit.source:
\n

Returns a reference to the internal buffer.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxx x xxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets the maximum length in two-byte characters of the value the internal buffer can hold.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxx$xxxx xxxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxx xxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The character array buffer to copy into.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The character array buffer to copy into.
